sentences.sentence: He accepted his orders very unwillingly.
sentences.translation: 他非常不情愿地接受了他的命令。

sentences.sentence: We reached the stream, and they unwillingly walked ahead.
sentences.translation: 我们到了河边，但他们并不乐意再向前行进。

sentences.sentence: The lady unwillingly replied: "All right, Clara, but I shall also speak a few words to Mr. Sesemann."
sentences.translation: 罗特麦耶不情愿地回答说：“好吧，克拉拉，但我也会对赛赛曼先生说几句的。”
